thread.title: Shiba Inu's Potential: Could SHIB Hit 5 Cents in 2024?
thread.title_full: Shiba Inu's Potential: Could SHIB Hit 5 Cents in 2024?

author: @shanghaiist
title: Shiba Inu's Potential: Could SHIB Hit 5 Cents in 2024?
text: - Shiba Inu (SHIB) has experienced a market correction but investors remain hopeful for a rebound. The memecoin recently regained a zero it had lost in late 2023, with aspirations to hit higher milestones, reminiscent of Dogecoin’s (DOGE) surge past the $0.7 mark. - Reaching a goal of $0.05 would require a growth of about 555,455%, a daunting but not impossible task given SHIB’s historical rally of several million percent from its launch to its all-time high in 2021. - The SHIB team has implemented an automatic burn mechanism in the Shibarium network and aims to burn 111 trillion tokens annually. Despite this aggressive burn strategy, reaching $0.05 by 2024 may be optimistic, but continued efforts could eventually lead to achieving this target. The cryptocurrency community has recently seen Shiba Inu (SHIB) recover a digit in its price that was lost in late 2023. This resurgence has sparked discussions among the SHIB Army—an enthusiastic group backing the memecoin—about its potential future gains. With a history of unpredictability, the cryptocurrency market is now abuzz with speculation on whether SHIB can achieve a significant milestone in its valuation. Comparing Past Surges - Dogecoin’s rise to $0.7 caused a market frenzy and FOMO among investors. - SHIB Army hopes for a similar breakout that could propel Shiba Inu to new heights. Growth Potential - The target price of $0.05 signifies a staggering 555,455% increase from current levels. - SHIB experienced a monumental rally previously, increasing by several million percent from its inception to its peak in 2021. The Role of Token Burns - Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin destroyed half of SHIB’s supply, which greatly influenced its price. - The SHIB team plans to implement routine token burns through the upcoming Shibarium network. - Lucie, a SHIB team member, has expressed ambitions to eliminate 111 trillion tokens annually. Challenges Ahead - Reaching a $0.05 valuation requires a massive reduction in SHIB’s circulating supply. - Although the proposed token burn rate is ambitious, destroying enough tokens to hit the target by 2024 remains a challenging prospect. - Continued token burns are critical for SHIB’s long-term price increase, even if the $0.05 goal isn’t met in the immediate future. Despite the hurdles, the SHIB community remains optimistic, and with the cryptocurrency’s past performance, anything seems possible in the volatile digital asset market.
